actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: Joint resolution authorizing and requesting the President to issue a proclamation designating October 6-12, 1974 as "Newspaper Week" and also designating October 12, 1974, as "Newspaper Carrier Day".

summary.text: Authorizes the President to issue a proclamation designating October 6 through 12, 1974, as "Newspaper Week" and also designating October 12, 1974, as "Newspaper Carrier Day".

titles.title: Joint resolution authorizing and requesting the President to issue a proclamation designating October 6-12, 1974 as "Newspaper Week" and also designating October 12, 1974, as "Newspaper Carrier Day".
